===Serious Showdown===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Tartaglia)
:{{A|vo card tartaglia invite hard 01.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' You seem to be in pretty good form... Alright then, prepare to have a taste of my true power.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Tartaglia's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card tartaglia ingame hard 02.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' A negligible mistake &mdash; not a problem at all.

;(When the player defeats two of Tartaglia's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card tartaglia ingame hard 03.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' There's nothing quite like the thrill of being on the brink of defeat.

;(When Tartaglia defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card tartaglia ingame hard 01.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' What's going on? This isn't like you at all.

;(When Tartaglia uses an Elemental Burst)

;(If the player loses the match)

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card tartaglia invite hard 03.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' Huh, I give you an inch, and you take a mile. Fine... the victory is all yours.
{{Dialogue End}}
